abilities.name: I Am the Law
abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to show your badge of authority to enforce obedience, or to push yourself during a fight.

abilities.name: A Story to Tell
abilities.description: Once per run you can push yourself to tell a story about a dire mess you survived to achieve one of the following: motivate a cohort/mob into fighting or fleeing — give a fighting cohort +1 effect restore 1 Grit for everybody in the Posse.

abilities.name: This Ain’t No Pique-nique
abilities.description: When you Command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they’re not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.

abilities.id: what your country can do for you
abilities.name: What Your Country Can Do for You
abilities.description: You have access to law enforcement resources. Get +1d when you acquire assets during Downtime. All assets have a minimum quality of 1.

abilities.name: S’Only a Flesh Wound
abilities.description: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal). When you accept level 2 or 3 harm instead of resisting, clear 1 Grit.

abilities.name: Moral Compass
abilities.description: You gain an additional XP trigger: You did the right thing at cost to yourself. If your Posse has problems due to this, also mark Posse XP.

abilities.name: Tactical Genius
abilities.description: You always know the best position during a fight or hunt. If you’re able to occupy this position gain +1 Effect for you and everybody who’s there with you.

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.
